com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.motion.widget

Class DynamicMotionLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • MotionLayout
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.motion.widget.DynamicMotionLayout

  • public class DynamicMotionLayout
extends MotionLayout
    A MotionLayout to perform operations according to the ViewPager2 page offset.
